subject: Basketball
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Cuttino Mobley, who was acquired in a trade in November 2008, never played a game for the Knicks after team doctors said he had a potentially fatal heart disease.
snippet: Cuttino Mobley, who was acquired in a trade in November 2008, never played a game for the Knicks after team doctors said he had a potentially fatal heart disease.
